title: Top 10 Coaches in the NFL: Doug Pederson or Sean McVay? (Football 7/10)
description:
Sean Wagner-McGough is no longer with us to discuss and honestly pick apart his list of the Top 10 coaches in the NFL, so we tapped fellow Superfriend John Breech to come up with his own rankings. Breech and host Will Brinson embrace the Doug Pederson vs. Sean McVay debate that our pal Sean started a few weeks ago, while also examining Mike Tomlin's placement and what it would take for Andy Reid to supplant Bill Belichick as the top coach in the league.
